title: Interior Minister chairs meeting on enforced disappearances
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 20 (APP): Caretaker Interior Minister, Sarfraz Bugti here on Monday reviewed cases of enforced disappearances in a high-level meeting of the committee of ministers .
Defense Minister Lieutenant General (retd) Anwar Ali Haider and Law Minister Ahmed Irfan Aslam were present on the occasion.
Akhtar Mengal Commissionâ€™s report was reviewed in detail and the recommendations of the commission were also discussed in the meeting.
Furthermore, the policy formulation on enforced disappearances was also discussed in detail.
